page.title: 04PADSTOW VICAR'S SUNDAY
page.content:
{07.00}Get up{07.30}Arrive at church and change for service{08.00}Communion Service at Padstow Church{09.00}Back home for breakfast{10.00}Family Service at Padstow{11.00}Rush to Trevone{11.15}Service at Trevone Church{13.00}Roast lunch at home{14.00 Type out sermon{15.00}Have a nap or go sailing{17.00}Tea{18.00}Service at Padstow Church{19.00}Return home{19.05 Watch television{22.30}Retire to bed.
Most Sundays there are 70 to 150 people in the Church.He enjoys being a vicar most of the time, and the only ghost he really believes in is The Holy Ghost.The best thing about being a vicar is when talking to groups of people, especially children.The worst thing is people complaining.
